name: Nautiloid
description: A gargantuan elemental that resembles a massive nautilus shell, known for its enchanting abilities and aquatic prowess. Its shell acts as a dome, providing comfortable conditions for those inside.
memorable: The Enchanted Shell creates a magnificent palace inside the Nautiloid, able to accommodate up to 50 passengers.
goals: To provide safe passage and protection for creatures within its shell, while navigating aquatic environments.
relations: Typically found in partnership with other aquatic creatures or adventurers seeking refuge in its shell.
environment: Primarily aquatic environments, thriving in oceans and large bodies of water.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage and resistance to non-magical physical attacks.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma scores affect strategic abilities and social interactions.
attacks: Multiattack with beak and tentacle strikes, dealing piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Jet Propulsion allows it to propel backward, damaging and knocking prone creatures in its path.
senses: Blindsight out to 60 feet, granting it awareness of its surroundings even in murky waters.
skills: Possesses basic perception skills, though its low intelligence hampers advanced knowledge or tactics.
additional_information: Elemental Traveler eliminates needs for air or food in hostile environments.
The Enchanted Shell alters conditions within for comfort and safety.
Limited Telepathy facilitates communication with those inside the shell.
test_queries: creature that can create palatial shelters
elemental that swims fast and provides refuge
